DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluate efficacy , safety tolerability GSP 301 NS compare placebo NS individual monotherapy formulation treatment Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis ( subject 12 year age old )
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety GSP 301 Nasal Spray Treatment Seasonal Allergic Rhinitis ( SAR )
DOC.criteria: Males nonpregnant female 12 year age old . Documented clinical history SAR ( least 2 year precede Screening Visit [ Visit 1 ] ) exacerbation ( clinical evidence active symptom ) relevant seasonal allergen Fall mountain cedar allergy season ( e.g. , ragweed mountain cedar pollen ) A 12hour rTNSS ≥8 possible 12 congestion score ≥2 AM assessment Screening Visit ( Visit 1 ) . Pregnant lactating woman . History anaphylaxis and/or severe local reaction ( ) skin test . History positive test HIV , Hepatitis B Hepatitis C infection . Documented evidence acute significant chronic sinusitis chronic purulent postnasal drip . Subjects active pulmonary disorder infection . Subjects posterior subcapsular cataract glaucoma Plans travel outside know pollen area investigational site 24 hour longer last 7 day runin period .
